Alternatives to using Terminal or AWS Command Line

May 26, 2020

Having trouble getting the data from aws s3 using the command line interface in your terminal?

Please consider using CloudBerry MSP360 Explorer (free) software. It provides a user-interface to sync SafeGraph data on aws s3 to your local computer, all with clicks of a button. Here are specific instructions to use CloudBerry Explorer.

And friendly reminder: if you only need a specific portion of the data in geography or in time, consider downloading your data from one of our partner platforms: Unfolded AI or Rill Data

*content from Ryan Squireâ€™s announcement on Slack
